column2: PAPA BEAR THIS IS BRAVO. WE ARE IN POSITION AND READY TO ATTACK. OVER.
PAPA BEAR THIS IS BRAVO. THE BASE IS CLEAR. ALL RUSSIANS ARE EITHER FLEEING OR DEAD. OVER.
CHARLIE REPORTING. READY TO ATTACK. OVER.
PAPA BEAR THIS IS DELTA. IN POSITION, READY TO GO. OVER.
PAPA BEAR TO ALL UNITS. COMMENCE THE ATTACK, GO GO GO!
ROGER THAT BRAVO. KEEP IT CLEAR AND MOP UP ANY REMAINING RUSSIANS. BE AWARE OF POSSIBLE REINFORCEMENTS. PAPA BEAR OUT.
